modules.name: Mining Robot
modules.description: Basic autonomous miner. Your first step into the belt. Best on rocky terrain.

modules.name: Drill Mk.I
modules.description: Cuts through rock and hard crust. Best on rocky and volcanic worlds.

modules.name: Solar Collector
modules.description: Converts sunlight into mining power. Most effective on sun-baked desert worlds.

modules.name: Drill Mk.II
modules.description: Heavy-duty drill for extreme terrain. Thrives on volcanic worlds. Requires trained crew.

modules.name: Cryo Extractor
modules.description: Harvests ices and frozen volatiles. Thrives on ice planets.

modules.name: Asteroid Rig
modules.description: Full mining platform for asteroid rock. Best on rocky bodies. Needs a team.

modules.name: Magma Pump
modules.description: Taps molten ore from lava flows. Built for volcanic worlds.

modules.name: Orbital Station
modules.description: Refinery and logistics hub. Most efficient orbiting gas giants. Crew-intensive.

modules.name: Gas Siphon
modules.description: Extracts valuable gases from atmospheres. Best on gas giants.

modules.name: Deep Core Drill
modules.description: Penetrates dense ore layers. Best on rocky planets. Requires specialist crew.

modules.name: Geo Drill
modules.description: Taps geothermal and magma veins. Best on volcanic worlds.

modules.name: Stellar Harvester
modules.description: Harvests rare minerals at scale. Strong on desert and gas giants.

modules.name: Quantum Extractor
modules.description: Ultra-low-temperature extraction. Best on ice worlds. Needs expert crew.

modules.name: Void Crusher
modules.description: Pulverizes the toughest planetary cores. Best on rocky and volcanic worlds. Built for the late game.

modules.name: Nexus Collector
modules.description: Harvests energy across planetary systems. Works efficiently everywhere. High coordination required.

modules.name: Singularity Engine
modules.description: Harnesses controlled singularities to compress and extract matter. Massive output. Elite crew required.

modules.name: Dark Matter Refinery
modules.description: Processes exotic dark matter harvested from deep space. Extremely powerful but complex to operate.

modules.name: Stellar Core Reactor
modules.description: Extracts raw energy from miniature stellar cores. Designed for long-term galactic exploitation.

modules.name: Galactic Harvester
modules.description: Planet-scale extraction system operating across multiple worlds simultaneously. Requires veteran crews.

modules.name: Infinity Foundry
modules.description: Transcends conventional extraction. Converts raw cosmic matter into limitless wealth. Ultimate endgame structure.
